name: webdav-servers
description: Multiple WebDAV server implementations using Deno and Node environments.

scripts.reset: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.awscp: scp -i lightsail-aws.pem auth-deno.js deno-cli-server.js restart-webdav.sh ubuntu@3.137.171.107:~
scripts.aws: npm run awscp && npm run awsrun
scripts.commit: git add --all && git status && git commit --verbose && git push
